name: Super Monza GP 2
overview: Super Monza GP 2 is the sequel to 2022's Super Monza GP. - This is a racing game for the 32K expanded Commodore VIC 20. - This game expands on the original game by adding three more circuits (Monaco, Spa and Interlagos). - Colliding with cars now results in damage, which can be repaired by entering the pits during the race. More damage equals slower maximum speed. - "Race against the clock" mode has been replaced by a "Championship" mode, where you have to complete every race with a podium finish in order to continue. - PAL / NTSC. It will run on either a PAL or NTSC system, but it is designed to run on a PAL system. It will run slightly faster on a NTSC system and will play a little harder. - Joystick only.
